content: Storage space amount is about to be exceeded: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when storage space is about to be exceeded. It shows the current and maximum storage values in a specific format. This message appears as a header in a UI component that displays quota information.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Storage space amount" is not accurately translated. "Yaddaş sahəsinin həcmi" is more accurately 'memory area volume' rather than 'storage space amount'.

The translation 'Պահեստային տարածքի քանակը քիչ է մնում գերազանցվի' is not a direct or natural translation of 'Storage space amount is about to be exceeded'. A more accurate translation would convey the sense of impending exceedance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պահեստային տարածքը այնպես է մոտենում գերազանցմանը, որ {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'գերազանցվի' (will be exceeded) is grammatically correct, but 'գերազանցմանը' is more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed for grammar itself, but see overall suggestion above

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'staat op het punt overschreden te worden' is grammatically awkward in Dutch. A more natural phrasing would be 'overschreden te worden' or 'wordt overschreden'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: De hoeveelheid opslagruimte staat er op het punt overschreden te worden: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "A capacidade de armazenamento do espaço está prestes a ser excedida" is a bit awkward. "A capacidade de armazenamento" can be simplified. "Espaço" is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A capacidade de armazenamento está prestes a ser excedida: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ආචයනයේ ඉඩ ඉක්මවීමට ආසන්නයි' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Storage space amount is about to be exceeded'. 'ආචයනය' refers to a ritual or ceremony, which doesn't fit the context of storage space. A better translation would convey the concept of 'storage space' or 'available space'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more appropriate translation might be something like 'ගබඩාවේ ඉඩ ඉක්මවීමට ආසන්නයි: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}' (Gabadawae ida ikmavamituk aasannai: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}), where 'ගබඩාවේ' (Gabadawae) means 'storage' or 'warehouse'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ц́е' is not standard Serbian Cyrillic. The correct form should be 'ће'.
